title: Something Wicked
description: 16-year-old Judas Stoker III loses his mother to a car accident, and he is sent to live with his estranged great grandfather in his manor. He hopes of forging a bond with him, only to realize he's stepped into a dark labyrinth of hell. Judas frantically documents his desperate attempt to unlock the mysteries of the manor before he’s consumed by the fractured nightmare that’s swallowed him whole.
author: Eve Hathaway
